Description.Text: LocationLocated in a residential area of Rincón de Loix, just 300 m walk from Benidorm's Levante Beach.Facilities and ServicesLast improvements made in 2006.Sun terrace with swimming pool for adults and children, sunbeds, parasols and bar service to pool. Children’s playground.Large restaurant recently refurbished, lounge bar and air-conditioned public areas. Entertainment programme.New lounge bar "Venecia", 400 m2.New Servigroup Dance Academy available to guests staying in any Servigroup Hotel, offering free dance tuition by professional dancers (based in the Hotel Servigroup Orange).Garage (supplement).Rooms103 completely refurbished comfortable rooms: air conditioning by fan coil system, heating, full bathroom, balcony, direct dial telephone, via satellite colour TV, safe (supplement) and electronic safety locks.RestaurantBuffet style meals using top quality products and high standards of food preparation. Gastronomically advised by chef Jean Marc Sanz.Commited to QualityISO 9001:2000 Certification awarded by AENOR, for quality management of "accommodation and dining-room services", and the international equivalent "IQNet Quality System".Qualitur Distinction awarded by the Valencian Regional Tourist Board. Fire and safety installations adapted to the current European regulations.Smoke free hotel / No smoking.*Maximum capacity is 3 pax including cot.***There is a $3 resort fee per day payable directly to the hotel**
Featuring an elegant decor and a warm hospitality, Servigroup Rialto Hotel offers the perfect setting in Benidorm to enjoy the sun, sea and the wonderful Mediterranean climate.
